replies.txt_content:
at tconstruct.armor.player.ArmorExtended.dropItems(ArmorExtended.java:249) ~
dropItems
发生npe
tconstruct问题可能

replies.author: 挼rua
replies.txt_content: 你这装了mod吧，最好去mod问答版
